org.netbeans.modules.jellytools.platform/3 3.32

Package org.netbeans.jellytools.actions

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Action
    Ancestor class for all blocking actions.
    Action.Shortcut Deprecated
    Use KeyStroke instead.
    ActionNoBlock
    Ancestor class for all non-blocking actions.
    AddLocaleAction
    Used to call "Add | Locale..." popup menu item on properties node.
    AttachWindowAction
    Used to attach a window to a new position by IDE API.
    CloneViewAction
    Used to call "Clone Document" popup menu item, "Window|Clone Document" main menu item or "org.openide.actions.CloneViewAction".
    CloseAction
    Used to call "Close" popup menu item
    CloseAllDocumentsAction
    Used to call "Close All Documents" popup menu item, "Window|Close All Documents" main menu, "org.netbeans.core.windows.actions.CloseAllDocumentsAction" or Ctrl+Shift+F4 shortcut.
    CloseViewAction
    Used to call "Close Window" popup menu item, "Window|Close Window" main menu, "org.openide.actions.CloseViewAction" or Ctrl+F4 shortcut.
    CopyAction
    Used to call "Copy" popup menu item, "Edit|Copy" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.CopyAction" or Ctrl+C shortcut.
    CustomizeAction
    Used to call "Customize" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.CustomizeAction".
    CutAction
    Used to call "Cut" popup menu item, "Edit|Cut" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.CutAction" or Ctrl+X shortcut.
    DeleteAction
    Used to call "Delete" popup menu item, "Edit|Delete" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.DeleteAction" or Delete shortcut.
    DockWindowAction
    Used to call "Dock Window" popup menu item, "Window|Dock Window" main menu item or "org.netbeans.core.windows.actions.UnDockWindowAction".
    DocumentsAction
    Used to call "Window|Documents" main menu item, "org.netbeans.core.windows.actions.DocumentsAction" or shortcut Shift+F4.
    EditAction
    Used to call "Edit" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.EditAction".
    ExploreFromHereAction
    Used to call "Explore From Here" popup menu item, "org.openide.actions.OpenLocalExplorerAction".
    FavoritesAction
    Used to call "Window|Favorites" main menu item or CTRL+3 shortcut.
    FindAction
    Used to call "Find" popup menu item, "Edit|Find" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.FindAction" or Ctrl+F shortcut.
    HelpAction
    Used to invoke help using "Help|Help Contents" menu or the F1 shortcut.
    MaximizeWindowAction
    Used to call "Maximize Window" popup menu item, "Window|Maximize Window" main menu item, shortcut or maximize window by IDE API.
    OpenAction
    Used to call "Open" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.OpenAction".
    OptionsViewAction
    Used to call "Tools|Options" main menu item.
    OutputWindowViewAction
    Used to call "Window|Output" main menu item or "org.netbeans.core.output.OutputWindowAction".
    PasteAction
    Used to call "Paste" popup menu item, "Edit|Paste" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.PasteAction" or Ctrl+V shortcut.
    PasteActionNoBlock
    Used to no-blocking call "Paste" popup menu item, "Edit|Paste" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.PasteAction" or Ctrl+V shortcut.
    PropertiesAction
    Used to call "Properties" popup menu item, "Window|IDE Tools|Properties" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.PropertiesAction" or Ctrl+Shift+7 shortcut.
    RenameAction
    Used to call "Rename" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.RenameAction".
    ReplaceAction
    Used to call "Edit|Replace" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.ReplaceAction" or Ctrl+H shortcut.
    RestoreWindowAction
    Used to call "Maximize" popup menu item, "Window|Configure Window|Maximize" main menu item, shortcut or restore window by IDE API.
    SaveAction
    Used to call "File|Save" main menu item, "org.openide.actions.SaveAction" or Ctrl+S shortcut.
    SaveAllAction
    Used to call "File|Save All" main menu item or to do an API call.
    SaveAsTemplateAction
    Used to call "Save As Template" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.SaveAsTemplateAction".
    ShowDescriptionAreaAction
    Used to call "Show Description Area" popup menu item on a property sheet.
    SortByCategoryAction
    Used to call "Sort by Category" popup menu item on a property sheet.
    SortByNameAction
    Used to call "Sort by Name" popup menu item on a property sheet.
    UndockWindowAction
    Used to call "Float" popup menu item or "org.netbeans.core.windows.actions.UndockWindowAction".
    ViewAction
    Used to call "View" popup menu item or "org.openide.actions.ViewAction".
